data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 v1803 Firefox Nightly v63.0a1
data.actual_result: It only redirects to the My Applications page.
data.expected_result: The login page should redirect with the full URL
data.short_description: [Website Bug] Going to an application URL without being logged in does not retain the full URL path when being redirected.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a URL for your application without being logged in - Log in to Discord
